duties_responsibilities.duty: Create fun, interactive learning experiences while mentoring fellow Teachers.
Promote the social, physical, and intellectual growth of the preschool children in your class.
Take the lead on classroom management and curriculum implementation, plus be an expert on all licensing guidelines and company standards.
Build sincere relationships with enrolled and prospective families to promote achievement for the child and to support your center’s success.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree in Early Childhood Education preferred)
